1,Purchase Apple Phone,"Navigate to the home page, select Apple category, choose a phone, add it to the cart, provide checkout info, proceed to payment, and complete the order. Verify successful return to the home page.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link apple -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 3: Click on button bestChoiceHotNew
Step 4: Click on label gb
Step 5: Click on label gb
Step 6: Click on button buy
Step 7: Navigate to cart, provide checkout info, shipping address, and proceed to payment
